msg: â€” Hi, I'm Stefano Guerrini, a backend developer.
about_me: I was born in Messina {{age}} years ago, but I live in Milano.
about_tech: I work primarily with Java, I like to learn new technologies, such as Go. I've always been drawn to coding, I'm a technology lover, I love damn to have many doubts and ask myself many questions. I want to improve always myself! Also I like to have often new objectives. I consider myself a person dynamic and smart, always funny, and when is necessary a serious and finicking developer. :)
